page.title: 15HOME LIFE
page.content: In our family there are five people: Mum ,Dad,and the kids.Our names are Ashley,Sarah,and Hannah.The day begins at approximately{7:45am}when we all get up,dress and have breakfast.This is a{light meal}consisting of either toast or cereal with coffee,tea or fruit juice.{Both my parents}work:my mother teaches at a girl's school,and my father works in the space-research department in the University.Although I have a brother and sister to play with,I still like to occupy myself.To do this I can watch T.V ,ride my bike, read books,listen to music,play tennis use the computer or play the piano or my flute.My brother spends much of his time at the church,as he is a member of the choir.My{mother cooks most of {the meals,}but if she is too busy my father helps.We have a cat called Henry, and he is very friendly.
